Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-52798 affecting package reaper for versions less than 3.1.1-16
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-52798 affecting package reaper for versions less than 3.1.1-16. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package reaper is earlier than 3.1.1-16, affected by CVE-2024-52798
